title: Do i need to file I-485A and pay the $1000 fine
question: I am married to a usc. I receive a ss and a employment authorization through my mom work when i was under 18 years old it expired in July 2000 i am now 25 years old and me and my wife are filling we send the I-130 already but people are telling me when i file my I-485 i will need to file I-485A and pay the extra fine any help would be greatly appreciated
answers:
Well, what you are asking is whether your wife can qualify under INA 245(i). If this is the case, we need more facts to answer your question. I will recommend having a lawyer review before you file the paperwork.

Good Luck
Shah Peerally Founder and Managing Attorney of Shah Peerally Law Group PC
